result.markdown:
## Convertible Note with Discount **Context:** Yara invested in a startup using a convertible note of **$1.506 million**, with a **20% discount**. When the company raised Series A at **$1.02 per share**, her note converted at the discounted price. ::: {.question-block}
1. How many shares did Yara receive upon conversion?
âœ… Shares = Note / Discounted Price = 1.506 million / 0.816 = **1.846 million shares**
:::
